short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Override the new tab page with todoist.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: To help keep us on track, this extension changes the new tab page to todoist.com - in an effort to reduce random web browsing. To quickly access the omnibox (url bar) after new tab opens, press CMD+L or CTRL+L.
